definition: to bank up with earth/to cultivate (lit. or fig.)/to train (people)
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: So, make the original powder of powder culture medium for manufacture.
sentences.chinese: 這樣就製造出乾粉培養基的原粉。

sentences.english: Transgenic tobacco young seedings are obtained in taking root culture medium .
sentences.chinese: 轉基因菸草在生根培養基中獲得了菸草小苗。

sentences.english: Green bud was produced on the medium for differentiation.
sentences.chinese: 在分化培養基上，由愈傷組織誘導出綠芽點。

sentences.english: Serum-free hormone-supplemented medium could promote cell multiplication and differentiation.
sentences.chinese: 無血清培養基能促進細胞增殖，分化和成熟。

sentences.english: Without the Yeast in the medium , strain DL-7 cannot grow.
sentences.chinese: 只有在添加酵母粉的培養基中才可以生長。

sentences.english: Differentiation medium for adventitious shoots of different genotypes were decided.
sentences.chinese: 確定了各基因型的不定芽分化培養基。

sentences.english: The hairy roots grew well on MS hormone free agar medium.
sentences.chinese: 毛狀根能在不含激素的MS培養基上生長。

sentences.english: Use the liquid culture medium for pollen germination experiments of H. bodinieri.
sentences.chinese: 採用液體培養基法進行掌葉木花粉萌發實驗。

sentences.english: Glutamine and nonessential amino acids do no need to add superfluity.
sentences.chinese: 在培養基中不需要額外添加谷氨醯胺和非必需氨基酸。

sentences.english: But in 2D cell cultures, such gradients aren't present.
sentences.chinese: 但在2D的細胞培養基中，這樣的梯度就不存在了。

sentences.english: Stem segments of Chrysanthemum morifolium with axillary bud were cultured in vitro on base MS medium.
sentences.chinese: 以MS作爲基本培養基，離體培養千頭菊帶腋芽莖段。

sentences.english: This paper is a study of culture medium of Claviceps Paspali for ergot alkali fermentation.
sentences.chinese: 對產麥角鹼雀稗麥角菌的發酵培養基進行了研究。

sentences.english: Protocorm-like body(PLB)segments formed callus on VW medium with sucrose.
sentences.chinese: 原球莖在含有蔗糖的VW培養基上形成愈傷組織。

sentences.english: It developed into complete plants on hormon-free MS medium.
sentences.chinese: 體細胞胚在無激素MS培養基上發育成苗。

sentences.english: Study on selecting the isolation medium of actinomycetes and treatment methods of soil sample.
sentences.chinese: 放線菌分離培養基篩選及雜菌抑制方法研究。

sentences.english: The protoplasts formed calli in K8P liquid medium.
sentences.chinese: K8P原生質體培養基懸滴培養。

pinyin: zi4 ran2 yu3 yan2 chu3 li3
zhong1 shu1 shen2 jing1 xi4 tong3
